name: Floating on the sea
description:
Hi everyone! This is a relaxing storytelling game that focuses on a group of mates who happen to meet on a cargo ship. It is accompanied by chill music and lovely, simple images. Developed in Unity and fungus, hope you enjoy it!

For your best ecperience:

Adjust the page to 75% for the best gaming experience!

All the sounds in game:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/ambient/nature/nature-essentials-208...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/adventure-music-and-sfx-221545
